name: Clam Linguine
author: Paris
summary: This a simple and delicious recipe with clams and garlic. It can be served as an elegant dish or as a quick meal with french bread, if desired.
ingredients: 1 (6.5 ounce) can minced clams, with juice
½ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese
directions: In a medium saucepan over medium heat, combine olive oil, butter, garlic, tomatoes and parsley; simmer and let reduce
Add some clam juice if the sauce reduces too much
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add pasta and cook for 3 minutes or until al dente; drain
Add clams to the skillet and heat through; top with cheese and serve immediately
